If you need sync more frequently than 15 minutes, the recommended approach is to enable the push service which delivers new emails immediately.

See the link below which will guide you to set this up. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/configure-push-email-thunderbird-android

content:
As your first attachment states, you can hide the notification.

Reducing the interval below 15 minutes is an Android technical restriction. Android's WorkManager used for periodic sync allows a minimum interval of 15 minutes. See attached.
